name: Reverberation
description:
A bright light, a booming voice....a piercing sound that echoes through your soul. 

A room.  A clock.   A hooded figure.

Step through the door.

Please note this game is not finished and cannot be finished due to losing all of the files.  There are secrets, including a hard to find secret ending.  Good luck!  

I am thinking of remaking this someday and finally completing it.  Let me know what you think.  :)
